supervisor.model

Class BallotStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • supervisor.model.BallotStore

  • public class BallotStore
extends java.lang.Object
    The BallotStore class is used to store the results of voter's decisions (often referred to ambiguously as "ballots" but actually representing encrypted voter selections from a ballot). This class keeps track of ballots (again, selections) as they are committed and optionally subsequently cast by the voter. The BallotStore is the key factor in storing all ballots during an election and determining which ballots are declared as Challenged and which are treated as Cast and therefore counted in the election results.

    • Method Detail

      • addBallot

        public static void addBallot(java.lang.String ballotID,
             ASExpression ballot)
        Add printed ballot to the ballot store. If not cast before the closing of the elections, this ballot will be considered Challenged by the STAR-Vote System.
        Parameters:
        ballotID - - unique ballot identifier
        ballot - - ballot wrapper class encapsulating hashed ballot and r-values

      • castCommittedBallot

        public static ASExpression castCommittedBallot(java.lang.String ballotID)
        Cast of a previously committed ballot. This action results from a voter scanner his/her ballot. This ballot is now cast and counted in the tallying of final results in the election.
        Parameters:
        ballotID - - unique ballot identifier

      • getCastNonces

        public static ListExpression getCastNonces()
        Returns:
        all nonces of cast ballots

      • mapPrecinct

        public static void mapPrecinct(java.lang.String bid,
               java.lang.String precinct)
        Creates a mapping between ballotids and respective precincts
        Parameters:
        bid - ballot ID of voting session
        precinct - 3-digit precinct of voting session

      • getPrecinct

        public static java.lang.String getPrecinct(java.lang.String bid)
        Parameters:
        bid - ballot ID of voting session
        Returns:
        precinct associated with this ballot, or null, if none exists.

      • clearBallots

        public static void clearBallots()
        Re-initializes the list of cast ballot IDs and cast nonces

      • getDecryptedBallots

        public static ListExpression getDecryptedBallots(PublicKey publicKey,
                                 PrivateKey privateKey)
        Decrypts and returns unconfirmed (challenged) ballots
        Parameters:
        privateKey - - supervisor key
        Returns:
        LE of 2 LEs: hashed ballots and decrypted ballots

      • getUnconfirmedBallots

        public static java.util.List<ASExpression> getUnconfirmedBallots()
        Returns:
        List of unconfirmed (not Cast) ballots so far in the system
